Articles.Content:
Have the mechanics for communications changed in 1.3? I'm loosing contact with stuff in LKO, 130-140 km and in planes near the poles. I used to be able to keep an OKTO in contact with the ground, without an antenna.

 

Nevermind found my problem. the range modifier was set to .65... somehow. Now, I'm debating if I want to keep it there.

Edited July 23, 2017 by steuben
